DESCRIPTION: Activities that changes #yThemes. Effects of some cards are determined by different #yThemes .
Determines the effects of #yInk and certain cards. NL There should always be no more than 1 #ymain #ytheme during the battle at the same time.
The enemy is being dragged into your painting! They take #b50% more damage, and will be converted to #yInk charges upon death.

A form of power that provides buff based on current #ytheme. NL There should always be no more than 1 #yfield present during the battle at the same time, a new #yfield would replace the old one if different.
Transforms to stronger cards when played.
Gain temporarily buff depending on current #yTheme at cost of #Pallite charges. NL Normally, #yInk can only be applied once per turn.
Will be consumed instead of #yPallite charges when applying #yInk.
Shuffle the new card into draw pile and #yexhaust self.
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
